```{r}


data1 <- read.csv(file = "C:/Users/hyesi/Documents/after_covid_petition_data.csv", header = T, stringsAsFactors = TRUE)

head(data1)


library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data1, aes(V2, V5, color = V2))+geom_segment(aes(xend=V2, yend=0))+geom_point(size=1.5)+coord_flip()
```
